title: Is 'The Famous Five' a good book series? - Quora

response.answer_text: yes ofcourse it is!!!! the book is full of adventures and it is most liked book series by children. the book has small children who face many mysterious adventures…these books books which can be bought in MY PUSTAK website which is 100% trusted website. all the books which can be bought for a low cost and it is beneficial to us. regards.

The Famous Five is the name of a series of children's adventure novels written by the legendary Enid Blyton. I have spent most of my childhood engrossed in their many exciting adventures. The 'Famous Five' novels is the best thing you can possibly give to a child who is yet to begin his love affair with novels.
